name: Caves Crawler
description:
This is my degree project.

I made a cellular automaton to procedurally generate caves, mixing it with the marching cube's algorithm so that the cave generated could be rendered.

You, as a player of this game, have to traverse through the cave while you gather equipment that can be found inside, it can be armor, weapons or potions. But also, you can find enemies, these are skeletons that will be patrolling this caves looking for you, they also have the chance to run away from you. 

To win, you have to find the “Crown Of Jewels” inside the cave, and interact with it through your inventory.

Links to the assets I used are listed below:

You can play the game through the browser, but to have a better experience it is recommended to download the file.
